amendment.description: To require plans to procure medical countermeasures for treating forward deployed members of the Armed Forces against acute radiation syndrome and similar threats.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4762 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4762 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S8562-8566, S8600; text: CR S8562) To require plans to procure medical countermeasures for treating forward deployed members of the Armed Forces against acute radiation syndrome and similar threats.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4762 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4762 proposed by Senator Stevens.
